Title: Establishes protections for eligible adults from financial exploitation
Summary: Establishes protections for adults sixty years of age or older, or at least the age of eighteen and who, because of mental or physical impairments, are unable to manage their own resources or protect themselves from financial exploitation without assistance from others.
LawCode: Add ยง352-m, Gen Bus L; add ยง4-d, Bank L; amd ยง473, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the banking law, and the social services law, in relation to protecting eligible adults from financial exploitation
